creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: 2 paneled white cotton huipil with woven horizontal bands; multicolored designs of animals, zig zags and diamonds; small triangles of fabric decorate the neckline; circular medallion of same fabric (moon symbol)applied in center below neck decoration; plain band of white fabric at bottom
title: Huipil
